Place a bronze cube on a dust storm tile: Place a bronze cube on a dust storm tile and raise oxygen 1 step, or place a bronze cube on an erosion tile and raise the temperature 1 step. The hazard tile with the bronze cube cannot be removed.
Place one of these tiles on an area with: Place one of these tiles on an area with a steel or titanium placement bonus, ADJACENT TO ANOTHER OF YOUR TILES. This tile provides an ADJACENCY BONUS of the same resource as the area. Increase your production of that resource 1 step.
Action: Spend 7 M€ to increase your stee: Action : Dépensez 7 M€ pour augmenter votre production d'acier de 1.
Place this tile adjacent to a city tile. This tile grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 1 steel.
Effect: When an ADJACENCY BONUS is colle: Effect: When an ADJACENCY BONUS is collected from a tile you own, you gain 1 M€.
Action: Remove 1 animal from THIS card t: Action: Remove 1 animal from THIS card to add 1 animal to ANOTHER card.
Requires 1 science tag to play. Add 2 an: Requires 1 science tag to play. Add 2 animals to this card. OTHERS MAY NOT REMOVE ANIMALS FROM THIS CARD.
Gain 1 TR. Move each hazard marker up to: Gain 1 TR. Move each hazard marker up to 1 step up or down along its terraforming track.
Effect: When placing a tile ON MARS gran: Effect: When placing a tile ON MARS grants you any steel, titanium, or heat, you gain one additional of each of those resources that you gain.
Requires 5 or fewer greeneries on Mars.
Effect: When placing a tile grants you a: Effect: When placing a tile grants you any plants, animals or microbes, you gain one additional of each of those resources that you gain.
Decrease your energy production 4 steps: Decrease your energy production 4 steps and increase your plant production 2 steps. Raise your TR 3 steps. Place this tile. It provides adjacency bonus of 1 plant and 1 microbe.
Place one of these tiles on an area with: Place one of these tiles on an area with a steel or titanium placement bonus. This tile provides an ADJACENCY BONUS of the same resource as the area. Increase your production of that resource 1 step.
Oxygen must be 4% or less. Place this ti: Oxygen must be 4% or less. Place this tile NEXT TO NO OTHER TILE. The tile grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of of 1 M€. Increase your M€ production 1 step.
1 PV par animal sur cette carte.
Requires 5 ocean tiles. Place this tile: Requires 5 ocean tiles. Place this tile on top of an existing ocean tile. The tile grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 1 animal. Add 1 animal to this card.
Raise the temperature two steps. Place t: Raise the temperature two steps. Place this tile. Players must pay an additional 2M€ when they place a tile with their player marker on it ADJACENT to the Nuclear Zone.
Action : Dépensez 2 M€ pour piocher une carte.
Place this tile which grants an ADJACENC: Place this tile which grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 1 card.
Place this tile which grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 2 energy. Increase your energy production 1 step for each plant resource on the area where you place the tile.
Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your en: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 2 steps. Place this tile ADJACENT TO an ocean tile. The tile grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 2 Energy.
Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 ste: Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 steel. Place this tile ADJACENT TO no city tile. It provides adjacency bonus of 1 asteroid and 1 steel. Remove up to 6 plants from any player.
Effect: When you play an animal or plant: Effet : Lorsque vous jouez un badge Animal ou Plante (y compris ces deux-là), ajoutez un animal sur cette carte.
The tile grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 1: The tile grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 1 animal. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.
Nécessite que vous possédiez une tuile Forêt. Placez cette tuile ADJACENTE À N'IMPORTE QUELLE TUILE FORÊT.
Requires 1 science tag. Increase your pl: Requires 1 science tag. Increase your plant production 1 step. Add up to 2 microbes to ANY card. Place this tile which grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 1 plant and 1 microbe.
Raise temperature 1 step and gain 1 tita: Raise temperature 1 step and gain 1 titanium. Remove up to 4 plants from any player. Place this tile which grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 1 titanium.
Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your he: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your heat production 1 step and increase your plant production 1 step. Place this tile on top of an existing ocean tile. The tile grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 1 plant.
Place this tile which grants an ADJACENC: Place this tile which grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 2 M€. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 4 steps.
Requires 6 ocean tiles. Decrease your en: Requires 6 ocean tiles. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 3 steps. Place this tile on top of an existing ocean tile, IGNORING NORMAL PLACEMENT RESTRICTIONS FOR CITIES. The tile counts as a city as well as an ocean.
Raise temperature 2 steps and place this: Raise temperature 2 steps and place this tile ON EITHER THARSIS THOLUS, ASCRAEUS MONS, PAVONIS MONS OR ARSIA MONS. This tile grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 2 heat.
Increase your heat production 4 steps. P: Increase your heat production 4 steps. Place this tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN. The tile grants an ADJACENCY BONUS of 2 heat.
